__inputs.description: Provisioned Loki log stream for usage insights in Grafana Cloud.
__inputs.label: loki-datasource
__inputs.name: DS_LOKI

__inputs.description: Provisioned Prometheus metrics on general usage in Grafana Cloud.
__inputs.label: prometheus
__inputs.name: DS_PROMETHEUS

dashboard.description: This dashboard exists to help identify queries that are heavy hitters relative to your Query Fair Usage Ratio.

targets.expr: sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*" | source!~"grafana-alert|grafana-lokiexplore-app"| dashboard_id="" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes) [$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id!="" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-alert" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-lokiexplore-app" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source=""| dashboard_id="" [$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id!=""[$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-alert"[$__range]))
sum(count_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-lokiexplore-app"[$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source=""| dashboard_id!=""  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-alert" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))

sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!~"grafana-alert|grafana-lokiexplore-app"| dashboard_id=""  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-lokiexplore-app"  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))

topk(20, sum by (grafana_username) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*" | grafana_username!=""  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range])))

60
/
(
    topk(10000,
        sum by (query_hash) (
            count_over_time(
                {org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id="" | total_bytes > 1MB
                [$__range]
            )
        ) > 0
    )
    /
    ($__range_s/60)
)
sum by (user) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" | logfmt | user=~"$instance"| path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range]))
sum by (user, name) (label_replace(grafanacloud_logs_instance_info{org_id=~"$orgID",id=~"$instance"}, "user", "$1", "id", "(.*)"))

panels.description: This panel shows queries executed via the default Explore page and queries executed from non-Grafana frontend sources, such as logcli.

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (query_hash, query, panel_id, grafana_username, user) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source=""| dashboard_id=""  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range])))

60
/
(
    topk(10000,
        sum by (query_hash) (
            count_over_time(
                {org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id="" | total_bytes > 1MB
                [$__range]
            )
        ) > 0
    )
    /
    ($__range_s/60)
)

panels.title: Explore/Other Queries

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (query_hash, query, dashboard_id, dashboard_title, panel_title, panel_id, grafana_username, user) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt | user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id!=""  | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range])))

60
/
(
    topk(10000,
        sum by (query_hash) (
            count_over_time(
                {org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source!="grafana-alert"| dashboard_id!=""
                    | total_bytes > 1MB
                [$__range]
            )
        ) > 0
    )
    /
    ($__range_s/60)
)

panels.description: If *some* rulers in this table do not show rule_folder and rule_name values then they are likely Grafana Recorded Queries and not Grafana Managed Alerts

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (query_hash, query, rule_name, rule_folder, user) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-alert"| unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range])))

60
/
(
    topk(10000,
        sum by (query_hash) (
            count_over_time(
                {org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-alert" | total_bytes > 1MB
                [$__range]
            )
        ) > 0
    )
    /
    ($__range_s/60)
)

panels.title: Grafana Alerts

targets.expr: topk(20, sum by (query_hash, query, panel_id, grafana_username, user) (sum_over_time({org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*"| source="grafana-lokiexplore-app" | unwrap bytes(total_bytes)[$__range])))

60
/
(
    topk(10000,
        sum by (query_hash) (
            count_over_time(
                {org_id="$orgID"} |= "request timings" |logfmt| user=~"$instance" | path=~"/loki/api/v1/.*" | source="grafana-lokiexplore-app"| dashboard_id="" | total_bytes > 1MB
                [$__range]
            )
        ) > 0
    )
    /
    ($__range_s/60)
)

list.description: choose the usage insights logs datasource
list.label: Usage Insights Logs
list.name: usageInsightsDS

dashboard.title: Usage Insights - 6 - Loki Query Fair Usage Drilldown
